name: Look at that kitty!
description:
DISCLAIMER: Because of some WebGL limitations, we highly recommend playing the Windows Build. Hopefully we can fix the WebGL Issues within the next few days but until then, the browser experience won't be complete.

TUTORIAL:
Click and Drag to Scratch.
Click and Drag to move in Chess.
Click and Drag to point the laser and bait.
Click the food to feed.
Click and drag to turn the wheel and dance.
Collect the drugs using the basket and drag them to the kitty to drug.

A game dedicated to coots and the 2000s internet cats.

Credits:
Leonard Blum: Sound & Music
Sofiia Skryhunets: Art & Design
Johannes Wolf: Programming
